body.name: Smart Video Doorbell Camera Wireless with Ring Chime, AI Human Detection, 2-Way Audio, HD Live View, 100% Wire-Free, Night Vision, Cloud Storage, Battery Powered, Indoor Outdoor Surveillance
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 48 mins
features: Protected Cloud Storage: With our secure AES-128 encrypted cloud storage, you can opt for a subscription (sold separately) for improved user experience. Plus, a 30-day free trial for continuous recording and sharing is on us!
AI-Driven Human Recognition: Our smart technology, powered by Artificial Intelligence, accurately identifies human movement, thereby ignoring irrelevant motion such as passing cars or swaying trees.
High-Definition Wide-Angle View: Our wide-angle lens delivers live video footage with impressive clarity and detail.

Bonus Doorbell Chime: The package includes a handy doorbell chime that you can place in any area of your home - be it the dining room, kitchen, or patio - for immediate notifications. Pair several chimes to a single doorbell for an even more convenient setup.
Robust IP65 Weatherproof Design: Boasting an IP65 rating for dust and water resistance, this doorbell continues to operate effectively in various weather scenarios, ensuring year-round protection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BITEPASS Wire-Free Doorbell Camera with Chime Included Comprehensive Home Security With two rechargeable batteries and an included indoor chime, our doorbell camera offers a holistic security solution for your home.

AI-Driven Human Recognition Our smart technology, powered by Artificial Intelligence, accurately identifies human movement, thereby ignoring irrelevant motion such as passing cars or swaying trees. Real-Time 2-Way Communication Engage in live, two-way conversations with visitors from any location. High-Definition Wide-Angle View Our wide-angle lens delivers live video footage with impressive clarity and detail.

Protected Cloud Storage With our secure AES-128 encrypted cloud storage, you can opt for a subscription (sold separately) for improved user experience. Plus, a 30-day trial for continuous recording and sharing is on us! Robust IP65 Weatherproof Design Boasting an IP65 rating for dust and water resistance, this doorbell continues to operate effectively in various weather scenarios, ensuring year-round protection. Complimentary Doorbell Chime The package includes a handy doorbell chime that you can place in any area of your home - be it the dining room, kitchen, or patio - for immediate notifications. Pair several chimes to a single doorbell for an even more convenient setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation and work efficiently
reviews.reviewText: This doorbell camera is really what I need! It is really easy to install with the instruction provided. Charge the battery, install the app and pair with your smartphone. That’s it. 1,2,3 steps - the door bell works so great with the chime and the camera is so vivid and clear. Love it. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It took me 5 mins to set up and mount my doorbell camera, and it works great! I’m pinged on my phone when there is activity at my front door. There’s also an option to pair it with a doorbell chime so are not only alerted on your phone, but also in your home. Great quality, especially for a fraction of the price of similar products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works Great , Easy Hook Up Also The Camera Is Clear It Works Wellll thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This camera has good quality (especially during the day) & really nice range. I didn’t want to pay ring doorbell price & I would say this is worth it. My only dislike is how often I have to charge it. I do have it on my porch front which gets a lot of traffic but I wish regardless it had a longer battery life. However convenient to just pop out & on a charger. Also easy to put together and install & Bluetooth right to my phone & my husbands. Took 5 minutes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We love it it has motion detection low medium and high , my motion detection is on medium and as you can see and hear in the video it picks up on anyone ever close to you apt/house also the audio allows for you to hear exactly what’s goings of ons 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aiwit doorbell camera
reviews.reviewText: This a nice camera for security and one of the best things about it is it's super easy to set up. Well worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Camera keeps going offline when you unplug the charger even tho it’s 100% charged. Will be returning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The product is a great alternative to Ring or Blink.
reviews.reviewText: It has clear images,is easy to program and the motion sensors are great. The subscription for storage is around 28$ for 180 days.
